resources.string: Welcome to my Business Management Application

The basic idea for this app is to connect customers and owners in a Snooker Academy. The customer downloads the app and registers himself. Whenever he plays a game on a certain snooker table, normally he pays by cash or card. I introduced a pseudo-virtual currency that the customer can purchase through many means(for the showcase of this app, its a simple addition through a button). The customer also gets some reward points as incentive for buying credits which he can redeem as more credits or physical rewards related to snooker. The customer can also see the current price,status of different tables and can spend credits to play on them. In a ideal circumstance the tables would be connected with some sort of IoT device to the database, which can record the playing time, customers and other information. This information would be shown to the customers and owner depending on access. The customer can see his transaction and playing history as well. Settings tab allow changing personal details and contact information such as callin, email and map navigation is also implemented.
